pages.spotlightText: The usual source of fuel that will power your Reactors.$(br2)Yellorite can be found in almost all biomes and can be smelted to produce Yellorium ingots.
Only found in the extreme recesses of hell, Benitoite crystals have some unusual properties that you still haven't found a use for.
You need to reach the end of your journey to find this elusive crystals, even if you still don't know how you could use them to your advantage.
